Oujimaru.original: Hello there our dearest angel!~ I have not been a tenshimp for a long time, I followed you back in late December. But I just gotta say… Thank you! Thank you for putting a wholesome smile on my face. Your laugh made my heart melt and I love how you communicate with your fans. In pretty difficult times, I have been looking at your live sessions and clips and immediately feel like a blessed individual. Thank you so much for being who you are, and I hope that we will see more great content from you! ❤️
